actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the making of grants to appropriate colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs for the training of physicians' assistants.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants to colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs for the training of physicians' assistants.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the making of grants to appropriate colleges and universities to assist them in the establishment and operation of programs for the training of physicians' assistants.
